Construct: Therapeutic Shopping Value: Positive Mood Reinforcement
Scale Items: Shopping gives me a sense of achievement.
I like the visual stimulation shopping provides.
Shopping gives me a sense of control.

Construct: Therapeutic Shopping Value: Negative Mood Reduction
Scale Items: Shopping is a way to remove myself from stressful environments.
I shop to forget about things that are bothering me.
Shopping is a way to control things when other things seem out of control.
Shopping is a way to relieve a bad mood.
I feel good immediately after shopping.
I feel good for at least the rest of the day after shopping.
I feel immediately better after shopping.
I sometimes buy things I do not need just to improve my mood.
I remember the items I bought during my shopping experience.
Shopping is a way to improve my bad mood.
